Row.Text: Illuminati Unique Building. +2 Gold. +1 Culture. Can be built in Towns. Ageless.
+2 Gold. +1 Culture. Can be built in Towns. Ageless. Forms the Shadow Sanctum unique quarter when built adjacent to a Library.
Illuminati Unique Quarter. +1 Production. +1 Resource Capacity.
Created by building the Secret Lodge and Library in the same district. Grants bonus Production and increased Resource Capacity.
